name: The Spectral Forest
description:
Hello! 

This is the first project I finished using RPG Maker MV, the game only lasts about 15 minutes (if you are fast, it can last less).  If you get stuck somewhere, you can mention it in the comment box. Although I doubt it, the game is simple and there are no dangers lurking for the player.

Story 

Peter has wandered into the Wraith Forest in search of his older brother Matthew. In the forest he encounters Adam, a man with macabre intentions who has been usurping the peace of the forest for many years.

Find out Peter's fate!





I need to improve in many aspects, any recommendation is welcome. 

This is not going to be my only game!
